entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8 except minus 17 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8 except minus 17 inland. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023
